markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Animal Accomplice](/Feats.aspx?ID=4422) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 52 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You build a rapport with an animal, which becomes magically bonded to you. You gain a familiar using the rules on page 212. The type of animal is up to you, but most gnomes choose animals with a burrow Speed.
name: Animal Accomplice
